level.heading: Tax on residents and nonresidents - "Taxable income" defined.
level.text: For the purposes of this chapter, and unless otherwise required by the context, the term "taxable income" means the entire net income of every resident, in excess of the personal exemptions and credits for dependents allowed by § 47-1806.02 and that portion of the entire net income of every nonresident which is subject to tax under §§ 47-1808.01 to 47-1808.06.

level.heading: History
level.text: (July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 343, ch. 258, art. I, title VI, § 1; enacted, Apr. 9, 1997, D.C. Law 11-254, § 2, 44 DCR 1575.)

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 47-1803.03, § 47-1808.06, and § 47-1809.03.
